# Reference
<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

**Classes**

* [`profile_rsyslog::client`](#profile_rsyslogclient): Configures an rsyslog client
* [`profile_rsyslog::relay`](#profile_rsyslogrelay): Configures and NCSA rsyslog relay

## Classes

### profile_rsyslog::client

Configures and rsyslog client for NCSA systems

* **See also**
https://forge.puppet.com/puppet/rsyslog

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_rsyslog::client
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_rsyslog::client` class.

##### `config_global`

Data type: `Hash`

A hash of hashes to provide global configuration options

##### `config_modules`

Data type: `Hash`

A hash of hashes to provide rsyslog module configuration options

##### `config_actions`

Data type: `Hash`

A hash of hashes to provide rsyslog actions configuration options

### profile_rsyslog::relay

This class configures an NCSA rsyslog relay to facilitate
sending logs to security from machines that are in isolated networks

* **See also**
https://forge.puppet.com/puppet/rsyslog

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_rsyslog::relay
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_rsyslog::relay` class.

##### `config_global`

Data type: `Hash`

A hash of hashes to provide global configuration options

##### `config_modules`

Data type: `Hash`

A hash of hashes to provide rsyslog module configuration options

##### `config_actions`

Data type: `Hash`

A hash of hashes to provide rsyslog actions configuration options

##### `config_inputs`

Data type: `Hash`

A hash of hashes to provide rsyslog inputs configuration options

##### `relayed_hosts`

Data type: `Array[Stdlib::IP::Address]`

An array of subnets or hosts allowed to relay logs via this server
Format can be a single IP or CIDR subnet

##### `relay_port`

Data type: `String`

The port number that will be used to listen for connections for relayed syslog
